name: import-mapper
description: Map bundled classes to dynamic imports.
author: Sean Morris

scripts.test: npx http-server test/ & ( sleep 5; kill -9 `lsof -t -i:8080`; ) & ( sleep 3; xdg-open http://127.0.0.1:8080/test-require.html; xdg-open http://127.0.0.1:8080/test-values.html; xdg-open http://127.0.0.1:8080/test-imported-extends-injected.html ) & wait
